title: Pentel EnerGel Kuro Liquid Gel Pen, (0.7mm) Medium line, Violet Ink, 12 Pack (BL437R1-V)
features: Retractable Pen With Smooth Finish, Slimline Matt Black Barrel
Slim, Rubberized, Latex-Free Barrels With Built-In Molded Grip For Effortless Writing
Reduces Smudging On Hands And Paper, So Suitable For Right Or Left-Handed Writers
Quick Drying, Smooth Flowing Energel Ink
description: Retractable pen with a 0.7mm point combines the best qualities of liquid and gel ink to deliver a super-smooth writing experience with highly legible results. Liquid gel ink dries quickly to prevent smears, smudges and globs for clean, consistent writing by either left-handed or right-handed writers. Rubberized, latex-free barrel with built-in molded grip fits comfortably in your hand for effortless writing. Pen is perfect for daily use at your home, office, school and more.
